property.name: sql
property.value: BEGIN /* -- step 1 - find new relevant records from watchdog data starting from the last processed one and finish those that are not pledged anymore*/ insert into cms_wd_re_execution ( cadastre_procedure_number, change_type, cluid, real_estate_id, jpv_id ) select distinct cp.cadastre_procedure_number cadastre_procedure_number, ch.change_type change_type, p.cluid cluid, are.REAL_ESTATE_ID REAL_ESTATE_ID, jpv.id jpv_id from cms_wd_procedure cp join CMS_WD_MESSAGE m on m.CADASTRE_PROCEDURE_ID = cp.id join CMS_WD_CADASTRE_EVENT e on e.MESSAGE_ID = m.id join CMS_WD_CHANGE CH ON CH.EVENT_ID = E.ID JOIN CMS_WD_RE_JPV JPV ON JPV.ID = CH.ID JOIN CMS_WD_PARTNER PAR_TO ON PAR_TO.ID = JPV.PARTY_WITH_RELATIONSHIP_TO_ID JOIN CMS_WD_PARTNER_MATCH pm on pm.watchdog_partner_id = par_to.id join cms_partner_role pr on pr.id = pm.id join cms_partner p on p.id = pr.partner_id JOIN CMS_WD_ABSTRACT_RE ARE ON ARE.ID = JPV.REAL_ESTATES_RELATED_TO_ID join cms_re_asset_item reai on reai.real_estate_id = are.real_estate_id join cms_collateral_Asset_item ai on ai.id = reai.id join cms_collateral_asset a on a.id = ai.asset_id join cms_collateral c on c.collateral_asset_id = a.id join CMS_RE_PLEDGER pled on pled.FUNCTIONAL_UNIT_ID = a.id and pled.REAL_ESTATE_ASSET_ITEM_ID = reai.id join cms_partner_role pr1 on pr1.id = pled.id left join cms_partner p1 on p1.id = pr1.partner_id left join cms_partner p2 on p2.id = pr1.sjm_partner_id WHERE 1=1 and (p1.cluid = p.cluid or p2.cluid = p.cluid) and c.state in ('activated') and ch.change_type in ('INS', 'DEL') and PAR_TO.match_quality = 'ONE' AND JPV.CADASTRE_LEGAL_REL_TYPE IN ('104','105','106','135','163','164','169','170','171','172','173','174','239','240','241','252','253','259') and cp.id > (select VALUE from wdp_system_property where id = 'cscollateral/watchdog/WatchdogLastExecutionWarningMessageId') union select distinct cp.cadastre_procedure_number cadastre_procedure_number, ch.change_type change_type, p1.cluid cluid, are.REAL_ESTATE_ID REAL_ESTATE_ID, jpv.id jpv_id from cms_wd_procedure cp join CMS_WD_MESSAGE m on m.CADASTRE_PROCEDURE_ID = cp.id join CMS_WD_CADASTRE_EVENT e on e.MESSAGE_ID = m.id join CMS_WD_CHANGE CH ON CH.EVENT_ID = E.ID JOIN CMS_WD_RE_JPV JPV ON JPV.ID = CH.ID JOIN CMS_WD_ABSTRACT_RE ARE ON ARE.ID = JPV.REAL_ESTATES_RELATED_TO_ID join cms_re_asset_item reai on reai.real_estate_id = are.real_estate_id join cms_collateral_Asset_item ai on ai.id = reai.id join cms_collateral_asset a on a.id = ai.asset_id join cms_collateral c on c.collateral_asset_id = a.id join CMS_RE_PLEDGER pled on pled.FUNCTIONAL_UNIT_ID = a.id and pled.REAL_ESTATE_ASSET_ITEM_ID = reai.id join cms_partner_role pr1 on pr1.id = pled.id join cms_partner p1 on p1.id = pr1.partner_id WHERE 1=1 and c.state in ('activated') and pr1.sjm_partner_id is null and JPV.PARTY_WITH_RELATIONSHIP_TO_ID is null and ch.change_type in ('INS', 'DEL') AND JPV.CADASTRE_LEGAL_REL_TYPE IN ('104','105','106','135','163','164','169','170','171','172','173','174','239','240','241','252','253','259') and (select count(*) from CMS_RE_Share intres where intres.PROPERTY_CERTIFICATE_ID = reai.property_certificate_id) = 1 and cp.id > (select VALUE from wdp_system_property where id = 'cscollateral/watchdog/WatchdogLastExecutionWarningMessageId') union select distinct exec.cadastre_procedure_number || ' (již není zástava)' cadastre_procedure_number, 'DEL' change_type, exec.cluid cluid, exec.REAL_ESTATE_ID REAL_ESTATE_ID, exec.jpv_id from cms_wd_re_execution exec where 1=1 and exec.change_type = 'INS' and not exists ( select 1 from cms_wd_re_execution inexec where inexec.cluid = exec.cluid and inexec.jpv_id = exec.jpv_id and inexec.REAL_ESTATE_ID = exec.REAL_ESTATE_ID and inexec.change_type = 'DEL' and inexec.cadastre_procedure_number = exec.cadastre_procedure_number || ' (již není zástava)' ) and not exists ( select 1 from cms_re_asset_item reai join cms_collateral_Asset_item ai on ai.id = reai.id join cms_collateral_asset a on a.id = ai.asset_id join cms_collateral c on c.collateral_asset_id = a.id join CMS_RE_PLEDGER pled on pled.FUNCTIONAL_UNIT_ID = a.id and pled.REAL_ESTATE_ASSET_ITEM_ID = reai.id join cms_partner_role pr on pr.id = pled.id join cms_partner p on p.id = pr.partner_id WHERE 1=1 and reai.real_estate_id = exec.REAL_ESTATE_ID and p.cluid = exec.cluid and c.state in ('activated') ) and not exists ( select 1 from cms_re_asset_item reai join cms_collateral_Asset_item ai on ai.id = reai.id join cms_collateral_asset a on a.id = ai.asset_id join cms_collateral c on c.collateral_asset_id = a.id join CMS_RE_PLEDGER pled on pled.FUNCTIONAL_UNIT_ID = a.id and pled.REAL_ESTATE_ASSET_ITEM_ID = reai.id join cms_partner_role pr on pr.id = pled.id join cms_partner p on p.id = pr.sjm_partner_id WHERE 1=1 and reai.real_estate_id = exec.REAL_ESTATE_ID and p.cluid = exec.cluid and c.state in ('activated') ) ; END;

property.name: sql
property.value: BEGIN /* -- step 2 -- delete the cases where there is a change of ownership */ delete from cms_wd_re_execution where (cadastre_procedure_number, change_type, cluid, REAL_ESTATE_ID) in ( select distinct toexec.cadastre_procedure_number cadastre_procedure_number, toexec.change_type change_type, toexec.cluid cluid, toexec.REAL_ESTATE_ID REAL_ESTATE_ID from cms_wd_re_execution fromExec join cms_wd_re_execution toExec on fromexec.cadastre_procedure_number = toexec.cadastre_procedure_number and fromexec.real_estate_id = toexec.real_estate_id and fromexec.cluid != toexec.cluid and fromExec.change_Type = 'DEL' and toExec.change_Type = 'INS' ) ; END;

property.name: sql
sql
property.value: BEGIN /* -- step 4 - create the statistics for brand new cluids */ insert into cms_wd_re_execution_stats ( cluid, last_ins, last_del, curr_ins, curr_del, alert_source_id ) select x.cluid, 0, 0, 0, 0, hibernate_sequence.nextval from ( select distinct e.cluid from cms_wd_re_execution e left join cms_wd_re_execution_stats s on e.cluid = s.cluid where 1=1 and s.cluid is null ) x ; END;

property.name: sql
sql
sql
sql
property.value: select 'N' INS_FLG, 'N' UPD_FLG, 'Y' DEL_FLG, x.cluid PT_UNIQUE_PARTY_ID, x.pt_type PT_TYPE, -- Type of client (F/P) 'CN0' SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID, x.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID SOURCE_ID, -- Unique ID from external system '5' CATEGORY, -- SA_ALERT_CATEGORY lookup map, LOV CSAS_ALERT_SPEC '157' PN_TYPE, -- SA_ALERT_TYPE lookup map, LOV CSAS_ALERT_SPEC 'Na klienta a nemovitost v jeho vlastnictví (či částečném vlastnictví) je dle záznamů v Katastru nemovitosti vedena exekuce. Varování bylo vytvořeno na základě těchto řízení o vložení či výmazu exekučního řízení: ' || LISTAGG (x.cadastre_procedure_number, ',') within group (order by x.cadastre_procedure_number) || '.' PN_NOTE, to_char(x.valid_from, 'yyyymmdd') START_DT, REPLACE(x.ALERT_COMMENT, '|', '_') PN_COMMENT from ( select cluid, cadastre_procedure_number, pt_type, SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, valid_from, ALERT_COMMENT from ( select distinct e.cluid cluid, e.cadastre_procedure_number cadastre_procedure_number, min(case when p.business_entity_descriptor_id = 'cscollateral/Organization' then 'P' else 'F' end) pt_type, min(cal.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID) SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, min(cal.valid_from) valid_from, MIN(CAL.ALERT_COMMENT) ALERT_COMMENT, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY e.cluid ORDER BY e.cadastre_procedure_number DESC) rn from cms_wd_re_execution_stats s join cms_wd_re_execution e on e.cluid = s.cluid join cms_partner p on p.cluid = s.cluid join cms_client_alert cal on cal.partner_id = p.id and cal.category = '5' and cal.type = '157' AND cal.SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID = 'CN0' and cal.active = 1 where 1=1 and s.curr_del >= s.curr_ins group by e.cluid, e.cadastre_procedure_number ) where rn < 161 ) x group by x.cluid, x.pt_Type, x.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, x.valid_from, X.ALERT_COMMENT union -- new alerts select 'Y' INS_FLG, 'N' UPD_FLG, 'N' DEL_FLG, x.cluid PT_UNIQUE_PARTY_ID, x.pt_type PT_TYPE, -- Type of client (F/P) 'CN0' SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID, x.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID || '' SOURCE_ID, -- Unique ID from external system '5' CATEGORY, -- SA_ALERT_CATEGORY lookup map, LOV CSAS_ALERT_SPEC '157' PN_TYPE, -- SA_ALERT_TYPE lookup map, LOV CSAS_ALERT_SPEC 'Na klienta a nemovitost v jeho vlastnictví (či částečném vlastnictví) je dle záznamů v Katastru nemovitosti vedena exekuce. Varování bylo vytvořeno na základě těchto řízení o vložení či výmazu exekučního řízení: ' || LISTAGG (x.cadastre_procedure_number, ',') within group (order by x.cadastre_procedure_number) || '.' PN_NOTE, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') START_DT, '' PN_COMMENT from ( select cluid, cadastre_procedure_number, pt_type, SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, valid_from from ( select distinct e.cluid cluid, e.cadastre_procedure_number cadastre_procedure_number, min(case when p.business_entity_descriptor_id = 'cscollateral/Organization' then 'P' else 'F' end) pt_type, min(s.alert_source_id) SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, min(cal.valid_from) valid_from, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY e.cluid ORDER BY e.cadastre_procedure_number DESC) rn from cms_wd_re_execution_stats s join cms_wd_re_execution e on e.cluid = s.cluid join cms_partner p on p.cluid = s.cluid left join cms_client_alert cal on cal.partner_id = p.id and cal.category = '5' and cal.type = '157' AND SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID = 'CN0' and cal.active = 1 where 1=1 and s.curr_del < s.curr_ins and s.last_ins = 0 and cal.id is null group by e.cluid, e.cadastre_procedure_number ) where rn < 161 ) x group by x.cluid, x.pt_Type, x.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, x.valid_from union -- updated alerts select 'N' INS_FLG, 'Y' UPD_FLG, 'N' DEL_FLG, x.cluid PT_UNIQUE_PARTY_ID, x.pt_type PT_TYPE, -- Type of client (F/P) 'CN0' SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID, x.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID SOURCE_ID, -- Unique ID from external system '5' CATEGORY, -- SA_ALERT_CATEGORY lookup map, LOV CSAS_ALERT_SPEC '157' PN_TYPE, -- SA_ALERT_TYPE lookup map, LOV CSAS_ALERT_SPEC 'Na klienta a nemovitost v jeho vlastnictví (či částečném vlastnictví) je dle záznamů v Katastru nemovitosti vedena exekuce. Varování bylo vytvořeno na základě těchto řízení o vložení či výmazu exekučního řízení: ' || LISTAGG (x.cadastre_procedure_number, ',') within group (order by x.cadastre_procedure_number) || '.' PN_NOTE, to_char(x.valid_from, 'yyyymmdd') START_DT, REPLACE(x.ALERT_COMMENT, '|', '_') PN_COMMENT from ( select cluid, cadastre_procedure_number, pt_type, SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, valid_from, ALERT_COMMENT from ( select distinct e.cluid cluid, e.cadastre_procedure_number cadastre_procedure_number, min(case when p.business_entity_descriptor_id = 'cscollateral/Organization' then 'P' else 'F' end) pt_type, min(cal.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID) SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, min(cal.valid_from) valid_from, MIN(CAL.ALERT_COMMENT) ALERT_COMMENT, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY e.cluid ORDER BY e.cadastre_procedure_number DESC) rn from cms_wd_re_execution_stats s join cms_wd_re_execution e on e.cluid = s.cluid join cms_partner p on p.cluid = s.cluid join cms_client_alert cal on cal.partner_id = p.id and cal.category = '5' and cal.type = '157' AND SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID = 'CN0' and cal.active = 1 where 1=1 and s.curr_del < s.curr_ins and (s.curr_del != s.last_del or s.curr_ins != s.last_ins) group by e.cluid, e.cadastre_procedure_number ) where rn < 161 ) x group by x.cluid, x.pt_Type, x.SOURCE_SYSTEM_RECORD_ID, x.valid_from, x.ALERT_COMMENT

property.name: sql
sql
sql
sql
property.value: BEGIN /* -- step 12 - update the statistics to reflect current status */ update cms_wd_re_execution_stats st set st.last_ins = curr_ins, st.last_del = curr_del where 1=1 and (st.last_ins != st.curr_ins or st.last_del != st.curr_del) and ( (st.last_ins = 0 and st.last_del = 0) or ((st.last_ins != 0 or st.last_del != 0) and exists (select 1 from cms_partner p join cms_client_alert cal on cal.partner_id = p.id and cal.category = '5' and cal.type = '157' AND cal.SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID = 'CN0' and cal.active = 1 where p.cluid = st.cluid) ) ) ; END;
